      void Chance.dealWithCard(Player player, java.io.BufferedReader userInput)
      Deal with card function which takes an input of player object and either reduces the money of player (PAY), gives money to player (INCOME), sends them to Jail (JAIL) or gives them a Get out of Jail card (GET_OUT_OF_JAIL) depending on a switch statement determined by the card's type
      abstract void Card.dealWithCard(Player player1, java.io.BufferedReader userInput)
      Abstract method which is implemented in either Community Chest or Chance which is handles the type of card and its cardType as specified above
      void TitleDeed.dealWithCard(Player player1, java.io.BufferedReader userInput) 
      void CommunityChest.dealWithCard(Player player1, java.io.BufferedReader userInput)
      Deal with card function which takes an input of player object and either reduces the money of player (PAY), gives money to player (INCOME), sends them to Jail (JAIL) or gives them a Get out of Jail card (GET_OUT_OF_JAIL) depending on a switch statement determined by the card's type CHOICE is the difference between Chance and this.
      void TitleDeed.playerAuction(Player bankruptPlayer, java.io.BufferedReader userInput)
      This is the player auction method which initiates an auction between a number of players and the owner of the title deed card (CanOwn object).
      void TitleDeed.setBankruptcyTradeStatus(int agreedPrice, Player recipient)
      This is used to determine the trade status of the site associated with this title deed card and whether it will be enough to make the player not bankrupt anymore.
